biography_text: JENKINS, Lynn, a Representative from Kansas; born in Holton, Jackson County, Kans., June 10, 1963; A.A., Kansas State University, Manhattan, Kans., 1985; B.S., Weber State University, Ogden, Utah, 1985; accountant; member of the Kansas state house of representatives, 1999-2001; member of the Kansas state senate, 2001-2003; Kansas state treasurer, 2003-2008; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eleventh and to the four succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2009-present).
